table_caption: Overview over the cohorts. Clinical markers, imaging markers and sample sizes both at baseline and longitudinal are shown.
table_foot: DTI = Diffusion tensor imaging, MD Median = Mean diffusivity Median of the WM histogram, PC1 = Scores of the first principal component, PSMD = Peak width of skeletonized mean diffusivity, DSEG θ = Diffusion tensor image segmentation θ, Geff = Global efficiency network measure.
